page.title: 02BARTHOLOMEW STREET NEWBURY
page.content: Bartholomew Street is a busy one of small shops and businesses linking the ring road to the south of Newbury to the town centre.Many businesses are run by their owners and most cater for regular customers who live or work locally. Most open for six days a week.Owners or managers agree that the town centre would be better for trade but they couldn't afford higher rates and rents. Shops in the street include butcher's ,baker's,newsagent's,chemist,shoes, clothes,sweets,florist,hardware and builders merchants.There are specialists in pets,fine arts and field sports.Services include estate agents ,building societies,travel agent and a bank.There are also hot food take-aways, several pubs, two garages, hairdressers and restaurants.
